mapper.select: SELECT MID, MPW, MNAME, MTEL, MEMAIL, TO_CHAR(MBIRTH,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MBIRTH, MADDR, MSTATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, MEMBERS.* FROM MEMBERS ORDER BY MNAME) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBERS
SELECT MID, MPW, MNAME, MTEL, MEMAIL, TO_CHAR(MBIRTH,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MBIRTH, MADDR, MSTATE FROM MEMBERS WHERE MID = #{mid}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, CAMPING.* FROM ( SELECT CAMPING.*, CA.CRPRICE FROM CAMPING LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT C.CACODE, MIN(TO_NUMBER(CR.CRPRICE)) AS CRPRICE FROM CAMPING C LEFT OUTER JOIN CAMPINGROOM CR ON C.CACODE = CR.CRCACODE GROUP BY C.CACODE ) CA ON CAMPING.CACODE = CA.CACODE ORDER BY CAMPING.CACODE) CAMPING) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAMPING
SELECT * FROM CAMPING WHERE CACODE = #{cacode}
SELECT MAX(CACODE) FROM CAMPING
SELECT * FROM CAMPINGROOM WHERE CRCACODE = #{cacode} ORDER BY LPAD(CRNUM, 2, '0')

SELECT BOCODE, BOMID, BOTITLE, BOCONTENTS, TO_CHAR(BODATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BODATE, BOSTATE, BOHITS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, BOARDS.* FROM BOARDS ORDER BY BOCODE) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARDS
SELECT CQ.*, C.CANAME, CW.* FROM CAMPINGQUESTION CQ INNER JOIN CAMPING C ON CQ.CQCACODE = C.CACODE LEFT OUTER JOIN CAMPINGANSWER CW ON CQ.CQCODE = CW.CWCQCODE ORDER BY CQDATE DESC

SELECT GORVCODE, GORVMID, GORVGCODE, GORVTITLE, TO_CHAR(GORVDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS GORVDATE, GORVSTATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, GOODSREVIEW.* FROM GOODSREVIEW ORDER BY GORVCODE) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GOODSREVIEW

SELECT CGRVCODE, CGRVMID, CGRVCACODE, CGRVTITLE, TO_CHAR(CGRVDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CGRVDATE, CGRVSTATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, CAMPINGREVIEW.* FROM CAMPINGREVIEW ORDER BY CGRVCODE) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAMPINGREVIEW
SELECT CQ.*, C.CANAME, CW.* FROM CAMPINGQUESTION CQ INNER JOIN CAMPING C ON CQ.CQCACODE = C.CACODE LEFT OUTER JOIN CAMPINGANSWER CW ON CQ.CQCODE = CW.CWCQCODE WHERE CQ.CQCODE = #{cqcode}
SELECT GQ.*, G.GNAME, GW.* FROM GOODSQUESTION GQ INNER JOIN GOODS G ON GQ.GQGCODE = G.GCODE LEFT OUTER JOIN GOODSANSWER GW ON GQ.GQCODE = GW.GWGQCODE ORDER BY GQDATE DESC
SELECT * FROM GOODSQUESTION GQ LEFT OUTER JOIN GOODSANSWER GW ON GQ.GQCODE = GW.GWGQCODE WHERE GQ.GQCODE = #{gwgqcode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAMPINGROOM (CRCACODE, CRNAME, CRSTNPEOPLE, CRMAXPEOPLE, CRIMAGE, CRPRICE, CRSTATE, CRNUM) VALUES (#{crcacode}, #{crname}, #{crstnpeople}, #{crmaxpeople}, #{crimage}, #{crprice}, 1, #{crnum})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RN, REV.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT CANAME, CRPRICE, CRIMAGE, RE.RECODE, RECACODE, REMID, REMNAME, REMTEL, REMEMAIL, REREQUEST, REPEOPLE, RECRNAME, RECRNUM, TO_CHAR(REDAY.STARTDAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS STARTDAY, TO_CHAR(REDAY.ENDDAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENDDAY FROM RESERVATION RE LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT RECODE, MIN(REDAY) AS STARTDAY, MAX(REDAY) AS ENDDAY FROM RESERVATION GROUP BY RECODE) REDAY ON RE.RECODE = REDAY.RECODE INNER JOIN CAMPING C ON C.CACODE = RE.RECACODE INNER JOIN CAMPINGROOM CR ON CR.CRCACODE = C.CACODE AND CR.CRNAME = RE.RECRNAME AND CR.CRNUM = RE.RECRNUM ORDER BY RE.RECODE DESC) REV) RN_REV WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT RECODE, RECACODE, REMID, REMNAME, REMTEL, REMEMAIL, REREQUEST, REPEOPLE, RECRNAME, RECRNUM FROM RESERVATION)

SELECT DISTINCT CANAME, CRPRICE, CRIMAGE, RE.RECODE, RECACODE, REMID, REMNAME, REMTEL, REMEMAIL, REREQUEST, REPEOPLE, RECRNAME, RECRNUM, REDAY.STARTDAY, REDAY.ENDDAY FROM RESERVATION RE LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT RECODE, MIN(REDAY) AS STARTDAY, MAX(REDAY) AS ENDDAY FROM RESERVATION GROUP BY RECODE) REDAY ON RE.RECODE = REDAY.RECODE INNER JOIN CAMPING C ON C.CACODE = RE.RECACODE INNER JOIN CAMPINGROOM CR ON CR.CRCACODE = C.CACODE AND CR.CRNAME = RE.RECRNAME AND CR.CRNUM = RE.RECRNUM WHERE RE.RECODE = #{recode}
